description: Manages DNS records on Exoscale DNS.

domain.description: Domain the record is related to.

multiple.description: Whether there are more than one records with similar C(name). Only allowed with C(record_type=A). C(content) will not be updated as it is used as key to find the record.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the Exoscale DNS API.

api_timeout.description: HTTP timeout to Exoscale DNS API.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

content.description: Content of the record. Required if C(state=present) or C(name="")

ttl.description: TTL of the record in seconds.

api_key.description: API key of the Exoscale DNS API.

validate_certs.description: Validate SSL certs of the Exoscale DNS API.
